traits.name: Overall Facial Harmony
traits.description: How well all facial features work together as a cohesive whole
traits.scoring_notes: Composite of proportion deviations from reference ratios

traits.name: Vertical Symmetry
traits.description: Left-right balance of facial features
traits.scoring_notes: Based on eye height delta, mouth corner delta, nose deviation

traits.name: Facial Thirds Balance
traits.description: Balance between upper, middle, and lower facial thirds
traits.scoring_notes: Forehead detection unreliable; lower confidence if hairline unclear

traits.name: Golden Ratio Proximity
traits.description: How close key facial proportions are to phi (1.618)
traits.scoring_notes: Computed from face width/height, eye spacing, nose-mouth ratios

traits.name: Facial Convexity Profile
traits.description: The profile angle from forehead to chin
traits.scoring_notes: Only score if side view provided with good quality

traits.name: Face Shape Classification
traits.description: Overall face shape category
traits.scoring_notes: Classification not score; used for style recommendations

traits.name: Face Width-to-Height Ratio
traits.description: Proportional relationship between face width and length
traits.scoring_notes: Lower reliability due to hairline detection issues

traits.name: Face Tapering
traits.description: How the face narrows from cheeks to chin
traits.scoring_notes: Jaw-to-cheek ratio indicates tapering

traits.name: Forehead Height
traits.description: Vertical height of forehead region
traits.scoring_notes: Very unreliable due to hairline detection; style can modify appearance

traits.name: Forehead Width
traits.description: Lateral width of forehead at temples
traits.scoring_notes: Hair can significantly affect perception

traits.name: Hairline Shape
traits.description: The contour and regularity of the hairline
traits.scoring_notes: Classification; styling can improve appearance

traits.name: Temple Fullness
traits.description: Hair density at temple regions
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting dependent; hairstyle can mask

traits.name: Forehead Skin Texture
traits.description: Smoothness and clarity of forehead skin
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting very influential; skincare can improve

traits.name: Brow Shape
traits.description: The arch and contour of the eyebrows
traits.scoring_notes: Highly modifiable through grooming

traits.name: Brow Thickness
traits.description: The fullness and density of eyebrow hair
traits.scoring_notes: Can be enhanced with grooming products

traits.name: Brow Symmetry
traits.description: Left-right balance of eyebrow shape and position
traits.scoring_notes: Expression affects; grooming can balance

traits.name: Brow Position/Height
traits.description: Vertical position of brows relative to eyes
traits.scoring_notes: Affects perceived eye area openness

traits.name: Brow Tail Position
traits.description: Where the outer brow ends relative to eye corner
traits.scoring_notes: Grooming can optimize

traits.name: Inter-brow Spacing
traits.description: Distance between the inner brow points
traits.scoring_notes: Should approximately equal eye width

traits.name: Brow Grooming Quality
traits.description: How well-maintained and shaped the brows appear
traits.scoring_notes: Immediate fix available

traits.name: Eye Shape
traits.description: The overall shape of the eye opening
traits.scoring_notes: Classification; presentation can enhance

traits.name: Eye Size
traits.description: The relative size of eyes to face
traits.scoring_notes: Palpebral fissure height and width

traits.name: Eye Spacing (Intercanthal)
traits.description: Distance between inner eye corners
traits.scoring_notes: Highly reliable measurement

traits.name: Canthal Tilt
traits.description: The angle of the eye from inner to outer corner
traits.scoring_notes: Head tilt affects measurement; positive tilt generally preferred

traits.name: Upper Eyelid Exposure
traits.description: Visibility of the upper eyelid crease
traits.scoring_notes: Varies by ethnicity; no universal ideal

traits.name: Eye Symmetry
traits.description: Balance between left and right eyes
traits.scoring_notes: Minor asymmetry is normal and adds character

traits.name: Under-Eye Area
traits.description: Appearance of the area below the eyes
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting dependent; sleep and skincare can improve

traits.name: Eye Color/Contrast
traits.description: Limbal ring clarity and iris definition
traits.scoring_notes: Photo quality heavily affects; very low weight

traits.name: Scleral Show
traits.description: Visibility of white below/above iris
traits.scoring_notes: Expression affects; minimal show typically preferred

traits.name: Orbital Rim Support
traits.description: Bone structure support around eyes
traits.scoring_notes: Difficult to assess from photos

traits.name: Periorbital Hollowing
traits.description: Depth/hollowness around eye socket
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting creates shadows; hydration helps

traits.name: Nose Length
traits.description: Vertical length of nose from bridge to tip
traits.scoring_notes: Should be roughly equal to middle facial third

traits.name: Nose Width (Alar)
traits.description: Width across the nostrils
traits.scoring_notes: Approximately equal to eye width is reference

traits.name: Nose Bridge
traits.description: Width and definition of the nasal bridge
traits.scoring_notes: Contouring can modify appearance

traits.name: Nose Tip Shape
traits.description: Definition and shape of the nasal tip
traits.scoring_notes: Projection better assessed from side

traits.name: Nose Symmetry
traits.description: Left-right balance of nose
traits.scoring_notes: Head tilt affects; most noses slightly asymmetric

traits.name: Nose Projection
traits.description: How far nose projects from face
traits.scoring_notes: Requires side view; omit if not provided

traits.name: Nasal Profile
traits.description: The side profile shape of the nose
traits.scoring_notes: Only classify if side view available

traits.name: Nostril Shape
traits.description: Shape and visibility of nostrils from front
traits.scoring_notes: Very low weight; camera angle affects

traits.name: Nasolabial Angle
traits.description: Angle between upper lip and columella
traits.scoring_notes: Requires quality side view

traits.name: Cheekbone Prominence
traits.description: Visibility and projection of cheekbones
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting heavily affects; lower confidence

traits.name: Cheekbone Width
traits.description: Lateral width at cheekbone level
traits.scoring_notes: Contributes to face shape classification

traits.name: Midface Ratio
traits.description: Proportion of midface to overall face
traits.scoring_notes: Brow to nose base / full face height

traits.name: Cheek Fullness
traits.description: Volume in the cheek area
traits.scoring_notes: Body composition affects; lighting dependent

traits.name: Nasolabial Fold Depth
traits.description: Visibility of smile lines from nose to mouth
traits.scoring_notes: Expression and lighting affect; skincare helps

traits.name: Midface Support
traits.description: Overall structural support in midface
traits.scoring_notes: Very difficult to assess from photos

traits.name: Lip Fullness
traits.description: Overall volume of lips
traits.scoring_notes: No universal ideal; proportional to face matters

traits.name: Upper-to-Lower Lip Ratio
traits.description: Proportion between upper and lower lip
traits.scoring_notes: 1:1.6 often cited but variable by preference

traits.name: Lip Definition
traits.description: Clarity of lip border and cupid's bow
traits.scoring_notes: Lip care and makeup can enhance

traits.name: Mouth Width
traits.description: Horizontal width of mouth
traits.scoring_notes: Should align roughly with pupils

traits.name: Lip Symmetry
traits.description: Balance between left and right sides
traits.scoring_notes: Expression affects measurement

traits.name: Philtrum Length
traits.description: Distance from nose base to upper lip
traits.scoring_notes: Shorter philtrum often preferred but variable

traits.name: Philtrum Definition
traits.description: Clarity of the philtrum ridges
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting dependent

traits.name: Lip Color/Health
traits.description: Natural color and hydration of lips
traits.scoring_notes: Lip care can improve; lighting affects

traits.name: Oral Commissure Position
traits.description: Position of mouth corners (up/down turn)
traits.scoring_notes: Neutral or slight upturn preferred; expression affects

traits.name: Jaw Width
traits.description: Width of jaw at gonial angle
traits.scoring_notes: Body composition and posture affect appearance

traits.name: Jaw Definition
traits.description: Clarity and sharpness of jawline
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting, body fat, posture all affect; modifiable

traits.name: Jaw Angle (Gonial)
traits.description: The angle at the jaw corner
traits.scoring_notes: Requires side view for accurate assessment

traits.name: Jaw Symmetry
traits.description: Balance between left and right jaw
traits.scoring_notes: Some asymmetry normal

traits.name: Chin Shape
traits.description: The contour of the chin
traits.scoring_notes: Classification for style recommendations

traits.name: Chin Projection
traits.description: Forward projection of chin
traits.scoring_notes: Requires side view; posture affects

traits.name: Chin Height
traits.description: Vertical height of chin region
traits.scoring_notes: Affects lower third proportions

traits.name: Submental Area
traits.description: Area under chin to neck
traits.scoring_notes: Posture and body composition affect; modifiable

traits.name: Apparent Neck Length
traits.description: Visual length of neck
traits.scoring_notes: Posture significantly affects appearance

traits.name: Cervicomental Angle
traits.description: Angle between chin and neck
traits.scoring_notes: Side view required; posture affects

traits.name: Skin Texture
traits.description: Smoothness and pore visibility
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting and photo quality heavily affect; skincare helps

traits.name: Skin Tone Evenness
traits.description: Uniformity of skin color
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting affects perception; skincare and SPF help

traits.name: Skin Clarity
traits.description: Absence of blemishes and spots
traits.scoring_notes: Temporary conditions; skincare helps; no diagnosis

traits.name: Skin Hydration Appearance
traits.description: How hydrated and healthy skin appears
traits.scoring_notes: Difficult to assess; general advice only

traits.name: Skin Glow/Radiance
traits.description: Natural luminosity of skin
traits.scoring_notes: Lighting heavily influences; skincare helps

traits.name: Under-Eye Darkness
traits.description: Visibility of dark circles
traits.scoring_notes: Sleep, hydration, genetics; lighting affects

traits.name: Under-Eye Puffiness
traits.description: Swelling or bags under eyes
traits.scoring_notes: Temporary; sleep and sodium affect

traits.name: Hair Health Appearance
traits.description: Shine, texture, and condition of hair
traits.scoring_notes: Care routine can significantly improve

traits.name: Hair Density
traits.description: Fullness and thickness of hair
traits.scoring_notes: Styling can enhance appearance

traits.name: Hair Style Face Fit
traits.description: How well hairstyle complements face shape
traits.scoring_notes: Immediate high-impact change available

traits.name: Hair-Skin Color Harmony
traits.description: How well hair color complements skin tone
traits.scoring_notes: Color changes possible

traits.name: Hair Face Framing
traits.description: How hair frames and flatters the face
traits.scoring_notes: Styling and cut can optimize

traits.name: Facial Hair Grooming
traits.description: Maintenance of beard/stubble if present
traits.scoring_notes: Only score if facial hair present

traits.name: Facial Hair Style Fit
traits.description: How well facial hair style suits face
traits.scoring_notes: Only score if facial hair present

traits.name: Smile Appeal
traits.description: Overall attractiveness of smile
traits.scoring_notes: Only score if smiling; neutral expression preferred for analysis

traits.name: Teeth Visibility in Smile
traits.description: Amount of teeth shown when smiling
traits.scoring_notes: Only score if visible

traits.name: Gum Show
traits.description: Visibility of gums when smiling
traits.scoring_notes: Only relevant if smiling

traits.name: Teeth Alignment
traits.description: Straightness of visible teeth
traits.scoring_notes: Only score if clearly visible; orthodontics can help

traits.name: Photo Angle Optimization
traits.description: How well the photo angle flatters
traits.scoring_notes: Immediate fix by retaking photo

traits.name: Lighting Quality
traits.description: How well lighting presents the face
traits.scoring_notes: Meta-trait about photo quality

traits.name: Expression Appeal
traits.description: How attractive the expression appears
traits.scoring_notes: Neutral preferred for analysis

traits.name: Posture in Photo
traits.description: How posture affects facial presentation
traits.scoring_notes: Forward head posture affects jaw appearance

traits.name: Camera Distance Effect
traits.description: Impact of lens distance on features
traits.scoring_notes: Close selfies distort; step back
